tool_description: 🔠➡️🎵 {V2_MP3} To utilize this API, you provide a URL with query parameters where you input a string. The API then generates a unique file for each ASCII character within that string, which can be downloaded. The query should conclude with "/playmp3?ascii_text=YOUR_STRING" for mp3 file or "/play?ascii_text=YOUR_STRING" for midi file as example.
name: TEXT to MUSIC API
title: TEXT to MUSIC API

api_list.name: Text sample of SuperMarioBros mp3

optional_parameters.name: ascii_text
optional_parameters.default: E5 E5 SPACE E5 SPACE C5 E5 SPACE G5 SPACE G4 SPACE SPACE C4 SPACE E4 SPACE A4 B4 A C5 SPACE G4 E4 SPACE G5 A5 SPACE F5 G5 SPACE E5 SPACE C5 D5 B4 SPACE C5 SPACE G4 E4 SPACE G5 A5 SPACE F5 G5 SPACE E5 SPACE C5 D5 B4 SPACE C5 SPACE G4 E4 SPACE E5 E5 E5 SPACE C5 C5 C5 SPACE G4 G4 G4 SPACE E4 E4 E4 SPACE A4 B4 A SPACE C5 SPACE G4 E4 SPACE G5 A5 SPACE F5 G5 SPACE E5 SPACE C5 D5 B4 SPACE C5 SPACE G4 E4 SPACE
